text: Momina purusa, striharu paraspara eka'arkaka sahayaka ra mitra hun uniharule ramro kura garna bhandachan ra naramro kurabata rokdachan. Niyamita namajaÃ padhadachan, jakata dinchan, allaha ra usaka rasulako ajnapalana gardachan. Yi tinai manisa hun, jasamathi sighra nai allahale daya garnecha. Nihsandeha allaha sarvasaktisali, tatvadarsi cha
